name: Little Warrior
description:
Little Warrior
A 7DRL
By Kyle.

CONTROLS
W,A,S,D or Arrows to Move
Z to Use 1
x to Use 2
H to show gameplay history

GAMEPAD CONTROLS
DPAD to Move
A to Use 1
B to Use 2

Enjoy!

Site: http://bostelk.ca
Support: support@bostelk.ca
